definition: to move up and down/to undulate/ups and downs

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
thoughts surging in one's mind (idiom)/different thoughts coming to mind
one climax follows another (of thrilling story)

sentences.english: The rolling plains and the wild flowers, the boxing ring and a few old scores to settle.
sentences.chinese: 起伏的平原和野花，拳賽場地和要解決的舊帳。

sentences.english: Roaming around whirly world rough breath in dark.
sentences.chinese: 在呼呼作響的黑暗世界，起伏着不平整的呼吸。

sentences.english: In the central regions you'll encounter rugged land and rolling hills.
sentences.chinese: 在中部地區，你會遇到崎嶇的土地和連綿起伏的丘陵。

sentences.english: Ah, the society is a large stage, so is human life a living play with one climax following another.
sentences.chinese: 呵，社會是一個大舞臺，人生是一出波瀾起伏的活劇。

sentences.english: Life has its ups and downs, its peaks and its valleys.
sentences.chinese: 人生也有興衰起伏，也有巔峯和深谷。

sentences.english: Euphonic is with amuse of, the voice also has no to heave and fall too greatly.
sentences.chinese: 語調是隨興的，聲音也沒有太大的起伏。

sentences.english: He tries to catch volcanoes when they are their highest levels of activity, but calculating the ups and downs of the eruptions can take days to complete.
sentences.chinese: 但是考慮到火山噴發，跌宕起伏，須耗時數日。

sentences.english: On the way of life, always meet ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 在人生的道路上，總會遇到波瀾起伏的事情。

sentences.english: Two people talking about knows, evergreen think people through ups and downs will grow.
sentences.chinese: 二人聊起知秋的事，常綠認爲人經歷起伏纔會成長。

sentences.english: So nice to know there are jackalopes around.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，起伏不定，很高興跳跳羊和我們相依。

sentences.english: Nonvolatile memory retains all of the setup information through power downs.
sentences.chinese: 非易失性存儲器保留了通過電力起伏設置的所有信息。

sentences.english: The hills rolled toward the horizon.
The heaving of the ship made her dizzy and she leanedagainst the handrail.
sentences.chinese: 輪船的起伏讓她頭暈眼花，她斜靠在扶手上。

sentences.english: Constant bubbling sends waves of lava lapping over the rim.
sentences.chinese: 不斷的鼓泡會將起伏的熔岩從邊緣溢出。

sentences.english: The undulating hills are rich in mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 峯巒起伏的羣山中蘊藏着豐富的礦產資源。

sentences.english: His term as president was tumultuous.
sentences.chinese: 他在職總統期間可謂波瀾起伏。

definition: one climax follows another (of thrilling story)
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
valley/trough (as opposed to peaks)/fig. low point/lowest ebb/nadir of one's fortunes
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
billows/great waves (fig. of a story with great momentum)
